DOC.brief_summary: This study assess Early Airway Response ( EAR ) associate change force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) plasma 9α-11ß-PGF2 ( '9P ' ) single dose pretreatment nedocromil , montelukast , mometasone .
DOC.brief_title: Early Airway Response Allergen Asthmatics ( MK-0000-176 )
DOC.criteria: History mild moderate Asthma In good general health ( except asthma ) Stable free respiratory infection Nonsmoker Females highly unlikely conceive ( surgically sterilize , postmenopausal , agree use 2 acceptable method birth control ) Nursing mother Recent ongoing upper low respiratory tract infection Unable refrain anticipates use prescription nonprescription drug Consumes excessive amount alcohol caffeine History stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder History cancer Received vaccination within past 3 week
